              36
            

            
              
            

                @document ||= Document.find_by(id: document_id)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def authorized_for_document?(document)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use Pundit policy to check authorization
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              34
            

            
              
            

                Pundit.policy(current_user, document).show?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue Pundit::NotAuthorizedError
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def add_user_to_presence(document)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                # Store user presence in Redis or in-memory store
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                presence_key = "document_#{document.id}_presence"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                user_data = {
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                  id: current_user.id,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: current_user.name,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: current_user.email_address,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  joined_at: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  last_seen: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  typing: false
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                if Rails.cache.respond_to?(:hset)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Redis-backed cache
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.hset(presence_key, current_user.id, user_data.to_json)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.expire(presence_key, 1.hour.to_i)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
            

                  # Memory-backed cache
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data = Rails.cache.read(presence_key) || {}
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data[current_user.id] = user_data
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.write(presence_key, presence_data, expires_in: 1.hour)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              def remove_user_from_presence(document)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                presence_key = "document_#{document.id}_presence"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                if Rails.cache.respond_to?(:hdel)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Redis-backed cache
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.hdel(presence_key, current_user.id)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                  # Memory-backed cache
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data = Rails.cache.read(presence_key) || {}
          
      182.

              2
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data.delete(current_user.id)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.write(presence_key, presence_data, expires_in: 1.hour)
          
      184.

              def update_typing_status(document, typing)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                presence_key = "document_#{document.id}_presence"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                if Rails.cache.respond_to?(:hget)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Redis-backed cache
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  user_data_json = Rails.cache.hget(presence_key, current_user.id)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return unless user_data_json
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  user_data = JSON.parse(user_data_json)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  user_data["typing"] = typing
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  user_data["last_seen"] = Time.current.iso8601
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  user_data["typing_at"] = typing ? Time.current.iso8601 : nil
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.hset(presence_key, current_user.id, user_data.to_json)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                  # Memory-backed cache
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data = Rails.cache.read(presence_key) || {}
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if presence_data[current_user.id]
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    presence_data[current_user.id][:typing] = typing
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    presence_data[current_user.id][:last_seen] = Time.current.iso8601
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                    presence_data[current_user.id][:typing_at] = typing ? Time.current.iso8601 : nil
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.cache.write(presence_key, presence_data, expires_in: 1.hour)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      210.

              def update_cursor_position(document, x, y)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                cursor_key = "document_#{document.id}_cursors"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                cursor_data = {
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  user_id: current_user.id,
          
      217.

                  x: x.to_f,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218.

    219. 
            

            
              
            

                  updated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                if Rails.cache.respond_to?(:hset)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Redis-backed cache
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.hset(cursor_key, current_user.id, cursor_data.to_json)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.expire(cursor_key, 10.minutes.to_i)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227.

                  # Memory-backed cache
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  cursors = Rails.cache.read(cursor_key) || {}
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  cursors[current_user.id] = cursor_data
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.write(cursor_key, cursors, expires_in: 10.minutes)
          
      231.

                end
          
      232.

              def get_document_presence(document)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                presence_key = "document_#{document.id}_presence"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                cursor_key = "document_#{document.id}_cursors"
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                users = []
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                cursors = {}
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                typing_users = []
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                if Rails.cache.respond_to?(:hgetall)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Redis-backed cache
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data = Rails.cache.hgetall(presence_key) || {}
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data.each do |user_id, user_data_json|
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    next if user_id.to_i == current_user.id # Exclude current user
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                      user_data = JSON.parse(user_data_json)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                      users << serialize_user_from_data(user_data)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      typing_users << user_id.to_i if user_data["typing"]
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                      next
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  cursor_data = Rails.cache.hgetall(cursor_key) || {}
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                  cursor_data.each do |user_id, cursor_json|
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    next if user_id.to_i == current_user.id # Exclude current user
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                      cursor_info = JSON.parse(cursor_json)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                      cursors[user_id] = cursor_info
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                      next
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                  # Memory-backed cache
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data = Rails.cache.read(presence_key) || {}
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  presence_data.each do |user_id, user_data|
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
              6
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                    next if user_id == current_user.id # Exclude current user
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                    users << serialize_user_from_data(user_data)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                    typing_users << user_id if user_data[:typing]
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  cursors = Rails.cache.read(cursor_key) || {}
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  cursors = cursors.reject { |user_id, _| user_id == current_user.id }
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  users: users,
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                  cursors: cursors,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                  typing_users: typing_users
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def broadcast_presence_update(document, data, options = {})
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                # Exclude specific users if needed
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              25
            

            
              
                
                  then: 7
                
              
                
                  else: 18
                
              
            

                if options[:except]
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                  excluded_users = Array(options[:except])
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                  # This would need to be implemented based on your ActionCable setup
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For now, we'll broadcast to all and let clients filter
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
              25
            

            
              
            

                PresenceChannel.broadcast_to(document, data)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def serialize_user(user)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                  id: user.id,
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: user.name,
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: user.email_address,
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                  avatar_url: nil  # Avatar functionality not implemented in User model
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def serialize_user_from_data(user_data)
          
      310.

              def filter_options
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                [
          
      57.

              def empty_state_message
          
      69.

                  then: 2
                
              
            

                if search_query.present?
          
      70.

              def file_list_container_class

                case view_mode

                  when: 10
                
              
            

                when "grid"

              def render_table_header

    170.

              def pagination_info
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return nil unless pagination

                {

              def render_pagination
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 11
                
              
            

                return unless pagination && pagination[:total_pages] > 1
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199.

              def pagination_info_text
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return unless pagination
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                start_item = ((pagination[:current_page] - 1) * pagination[:per_page]) + 1
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                end_item = [ start_item + pagination[:per_page] - 1, pagination[:total_count] ].min
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: "pagination-info" do
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  "Showing #{start_item}-#{end_item} of #{pagination[:total_count]} files"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def pagination_controls

                content_tag :div, class: "pagination-controls" do

                  concat(prev_page_button)

                  concat(next_page_button)

                end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      224.

              def prev_page_button
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return unless pagination && pagination[:prev_page]
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :button,
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                            class: "pagination__btn",
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                            data: { action: "click->cloud-file-browser#changePage", page: pagination[:prev_page] } do
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  " Previous"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def next_page_button
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return unless pagination && pagination[:next_page]

    43. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                  integration.cloud_files.exists?([ "last_synced_at > ?", 5.minutes.ago ]) ||
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  has_active_sync_job?(integration)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

              def has_active_sync_job?(integration)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                # This would check for active CloudFileSyncJob instances
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # For now, return false as we don't have job tracking implemented
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

              def global_status
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              16
            

            
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return "no_integrations" unless has_integrations?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              16
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
            

                return "syncing" if syncing_integrations.any?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              16
            

            
              
                
                  then: 12
                
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                return "connected" if connected_integrations.any?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                "disconnected"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61.

              7
            

            
              
            

              def global_status_text
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                case global_status
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "no_integrations"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  "No cloud integrations configured"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "syncing"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  "Syncing #{syncing_integrations.count} integration#{syncing_integrations.count > 1 ? 's' : ''}..."
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 3
                
              
            

                when "connected"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                  "#{connected_integrations.count} integration#{connected_integrations.count > 1 ? 's' : ''} connected"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "disconnected"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  "All integrations disconnected"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Unknown status"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76.

              def global_status_icon
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

                case global_status
          
      78.

              def total_files_count
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                @total_files_count ||= connected_integrations.sum { |i| i.cloud_files.count }

    108. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110.

              def last_sync_time
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                return nil unless connected_integrations.any?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                @last_sync_time ||= begin
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  all_files = connected_integrations.flat_map(&:cloud_files)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  return nil if all_files.empty?
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_files.filter_map(&:last_synced_at).max
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      119.

              def last_sync_text
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
            

                return "Never synced" unless last_sync_time
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                "Last synced #{time_ago_in_words(last_sync_time)} ago"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126.

              def sync_progress_data
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return {} unless syncing_integrations.any?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129.

              def integration_status_list
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return [] unless show_details
          
      137.

                integrations.map do |integration|

                  {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140.

      146.

                    last_sync: integration.cloud_files.maximum(:last_synced_at),
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 3

    148.

              def render_integration_status(status)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                css_class = [ "integration-status" ]
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                css_class << "integration-status--active" if status[:active]
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                css_class << "integration-status--syncing" if status[:syncing]
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                css_class << "integration-status--error" if status[:error]
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: css_class.join(" "), data: { 'integration-id': status[:id] } do
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  concat(render_integration_icon(status))
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  concat(render_integration_info(status))
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  concat(render_integration_sync_indicator(status))
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

              def render_integration_icon(status)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                icon_class = "provider-icon provider-icon--#{status[:provider]}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: "integration-status__icon" do
          
      169.

              3
            

            
              
            

                  content_tag :i, "", class: icon_class
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      172.

              def render_integration_info(status)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, class: "integration-status__info" do

              3
            

            
              
            

                  concat(content_tag(:div, status[:name], class: "integration-status__name"))
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  concat(render_integration_meta(status))
          
      177.

      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178.

      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

              def render_integration_meta(status)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                meta_parts = []
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
            

                if status[:active]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  meta_parts << pluralize(status[:file_count], "file")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
            

                  if status[:last_sync]
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    meta_parts << "synced #{time_ago_in_words(status[:last_sync])} ago"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                  else
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    meta_parts << "never synced"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  meta_parts << "not connected"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                if status[:error]
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                  meta_parts << status[:error]
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                content_tag :div, meta_parts.join("  "), class: "integration-status__meta"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

              def render_integration_sync_indicator(status)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                indicator_class = [ "sync-indicator" ]
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                indicator_text = "Ready"
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if status[:error]
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  indicator_class << "sync-indicator--error"
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                  indicator_text = "Error"
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                elsif status[:syncing]
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  indicator_class << "sync-indicator--syncing"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                  indicator_text = "Syncing..."
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
            

                elsif status[:active]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  indicator_class << "sync-indicator--ready"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  indicator_text = "Ready"

              def sanitize_markdown(content)

              def format_date(date)

            class PresenceIndicatorComponent < ViewComponent::Base
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(users:, current_user:, options: {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @users = users.reject { |user| user.id == current_user.id }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @current_user = current_user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @show_names = options.fetch(:show_names, true)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @show_cursors = options.fetch(:show_cursors, false)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @max_display = options.fetch(:max_display, 5)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                @size = options.fetch(:size, :medium) # :small, :medium, :large
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13.

              def overflow_count

              def user_avatar_color(user)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use a hash of the user ID to consistently assign colors
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55.

              def recent_documents
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              110
            

            
              
            

                @recent_documents ||= current_user.documents
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                                                  .order(updated_at: :desc)

                                                  .includes(:user)

              def extract_mergeable_content

    21.

              def cloud_service_for(integration)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                case integration.provider
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "google_drive"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::GoogleDriveService.new(integration)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "dropbox"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::DropboxService.new(integration)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "notion"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::NotionService.new(integration)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  raise "Unknown provider: #{integration.provider}"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101.

              end

              def search

      158.

                    render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace("context_items",

                # Use callbacks to share common setup or constraints between actions.

                # Only allow a list of trusted parameters through.
          
      223.

                def context_item_params

    app/controllers/documents_controller.rb

    94.55% lines covered

    87.5% branches covered

    55 relevant lines. 52 lines covered and 3 lines missed.
    8 total branches, 7 branches covered and 1 branches missed.

                else
          
      63.

    16. 
            

            
              
            

                # Default ordering
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                @sub_agents = @sub_agents.recent

              def create
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                @sub_agent = @document.sub_agents.build(sub_agent_params)

                @sub_agent.user = current_user
          
      56.

      57.

                  if @sub_agent.save

      64.

      66.

      68.

              2
            

            
              
            

                    format.turbo_stream {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.prepend("sub_agents",
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                                          partial: "sub_agents/sub_agent",
          
      71.

      72.

                  else

            module ApplicationHelper

              def format_date(date)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              61
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 60
                
              
            

                return "" if date.nil?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              60
            

            
              
                
                  then: 55
                
              
            

                if date.today?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              55
            

            
              
                
                  else: 5
                
              
            

                  "Today at #{date.strftime('%l:%M %p').strip}"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              5
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                elsif date.yesterday?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                  "Yesterday at #{date.strftime('%l:%M %p').strip}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
            

                elsif date >= 7.days.ago
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  date.strftime("%A at %l:%M %p").strip
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                else
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  date.strftime("%B %d, %Y")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

              def check_rate_limit!
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                # Simple rate limiting using Rails cache
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                cache_key = "claude_rate_limit:#{Time.current.to_i / 60}"
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                count = Rails.cache.increment(cache_key, 1, expires_in: 1.minute)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              8
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 7
                
              
            

                if count && count > MAX_REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  raise StandardError, "Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later."
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118.

            class CloudFileImportJob < ApplicationJob

              queue_as :default

              def self.discard_on

              def perform(cloud_file, user)

                  else: 19

      13.
