                  ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "import_started",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_name: cloud_file.name
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              19
            

            
              
            

                  service = cloud_service_for(cloud_file.cloud_integration)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Import file content
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              19
            

            
              
            

                  file_data = service.import_file(cloud_file.file_id)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create document from imported content
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  title = file_data[:title] || file_data[:name] || cloud_file.name
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Ensure unique title
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  sanitized_title = sanitize_title(title)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              14
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 13
                
              
            

                  if user.documents.exists?(title: sanitized_title)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    timestamp = Time.current.strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    sanitized_title = "#{sanitized_title} (#{timestamp})"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  document = user.documents.build(
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: sanitized_title,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                    description: "Imported from #{cloud_file.cloud_integration.provider_name}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Set content based on file type
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  content_type = file_data[:content_type] || file_data[:mime_type] || "text/plain"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  content = process_content(file_data[:content], content_type)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Ensure content is not blank
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              14
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 13
                
              
            

                  if content.blank?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    content = "<p>Document imported from #{cloud_file.name}</p>"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  document.content = content
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add import tag if method exists
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              14
            

            
              
                
                  then: 14
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if document.respond_to?(:add_tag)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                    document.add_tag("imported-#{cloud_file.cloud_integration.provider}")
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                    document.add_tag("cloud-import")
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                    document.save!
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Link cloud file to document
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                    cloud_file.update!(document: document)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Broadcast import completed
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                    ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                      "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "import_completed",
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                        file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                        file_name: cloud_file.name,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                        document_id: document.id
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully imported #{cloud_file.name} as document #{document.id} for user #{user.id}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue CloudServices::AuthenticationError, CloudServices::AuthorizationError => e
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Broadcast auth failure
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                    "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "import_failed",
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_name: cloud_file.name,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                      error: e.message
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Import error for cloud file #{cloud_file.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Don't retry auth errors - they're discarded
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue CloudServices::ApiError, CloudServices::NotFoundError => e
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Handle service errors without re-raising
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "import_failed",
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_name: cloud_file.name,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                      error: e.message
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Import error for cloud file #{cloud_file.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Don't re-raise service errors
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Handle database validation errors
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "import_failed",
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_name: cloud_file.name,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      error: e.message
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Import error for cloud file #{cloud_file.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Broadcast generic failure and re-raise for retry
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                    "cloud_import_#{user.id}",
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "import_failed",
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: cloud_file.id,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_name: cloud_file.name,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                      error: e.message
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Import error for cloud file #{cloud_file.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  raise e
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def cloud_service_for(integration)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              19
            

            
              
            

                case integration.provider
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 17
                
              
            

                when "google_drive"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
              17
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::GoogleDriveService.new(integration)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "dropbox"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::DropboxService.new(integration)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "notion"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  CloudServices::NotionService.new(integration)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "Unknown provider: #{integration.provider}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def sanitize_title(title)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle nil or empty title
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              14
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 14
                
              
            

                return "Imported Document" if title.blank?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                # Remove file extension and clean up title
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                title = File.basename(title, File.extname(title))
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                title = title.gsub(/[^\w\s\-_]/, "").strip
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              14
            

            
              
                
                  then: 14
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                title.present? ? title : "Imported Document"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def process_content(raw_content, mime_type)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                case mime_type
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                when "text/plain"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 12
                
              
            

                  # Convert plain text to basic HTML paragraphs
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                  paragraphs = raw_content.split(/\n\s*\n/).map(&:strip).reject(&:blank?)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                  paragraphs.map { |p| "<p>#{CGI.escapeHTML(p)}</p>" }.join("\n")
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                when "text/html"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  # Clean up HTML content
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  clean_html(raw_content)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                when "text/markdown"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  # Convert Markdown to HTML (basic implementation)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  markdown_to_html(raw_content)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                when "application/pdf"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For PDF, we'd need a gem like pdf-reader
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # For now, just indicate it's a PDF
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  "<p><strong>PDF Import:</strong> #{CGI.escapeHTML(raw_content.truncate(500))}</p>"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                when "application/vnd.google-apps.document"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  # Google Docs are exported as HTML
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  clean_html(raw_content)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Default: treat as plain text
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  "<p>#{CGI.escapeHTML(raw_content.truncate(5000))}</p>"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def clean_html(html_content)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                # Remove script tags and clean up HTML
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                # In a real app, you'd want to use a proper HTML sanitizer like Sanitize
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                cleaned = html_content.gsub(/<script[^>]*>.*?<\/script>/mi, "")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                cleaned = cleaned.gsub(/<style[^>]*>.*?<\/style>/mi, "")
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195.

              def status_badge_color

    161.

                  when: 49
                
              
            

                case status

    162.

                  when: 4

                  when: 0

    app/models/sub_agent_message.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    1.

            class SubAgentMessage < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              11
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :sub_agent
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              11
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :user
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Validations
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              11
            

            
              
            

              validates :role, presence: true, inclusion: { in: %w[user assistant system] }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              11
            

            
              
            

              validates :content, presence: true, length: { maximum: 100_000 }
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              22
            

            
              
            

              scope :by_role, ->(role) { where(role: role) }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              21
            

            
              
            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13.

              # Callbacks

              before_validation :strip_content

                role == "assistant"

                def handle_api_error(error)

    98. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  case error
          
      99.

                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  when Net::HTTPUnauthorized
          
      100.

                    raise AuthenticationError, "Invalid or expired credentials"
          
      101.

      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              1

                def export_document(document, options = {})

                def mime_type_from_path(path)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  extension = File.extname(path).downcase
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  case extension
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".txt" then "text/plain"
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".html", ".htm" then "text/html"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".pdf" then "application/pdf"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".doc" then "application/msword"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".docx" then "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  when ".md" then "text/markdown"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  else "application/octet-stream"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            end

      99.

                    when "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation"
          
      100.

                      # Export Google Slides as PDF

                def export_document(document, options = {})

                  content = <<~HTML
          
      129.

                    <!DOCTYPE html>
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130.

      135.

      136.

      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137.

      138.

      139.

                def google_auth

                  # Create Google auth credentials from tokens

                def oauth2_refresh_request
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  response = HTTParty.post("https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token", {
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: {
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      refresh_token: integration.refresh_token,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      client_id: Rails.application.credentials.dig(:google, :client_id),
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      client_secret: Rails.application.credentials.dig(:google, :client_secret),
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                      grant_type: "refresh_token"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  })
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  raise ApiError, "Failed to refresh token: #{response.body}" unless response.success?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  JSON.parse(response.body)

      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197.

    198. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                def handle_google_api_error(error)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                  case error.status_code
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  when 401
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    raise AuthenticationError, "Google authentication failed: #{error.message}"
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  when 403
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    raise AuthorizationError, "Google authorization failed: #{error.message}"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  when 404
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    raise NotFoundError, "Google resource not found: #{error.message}"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ApiError, "Google API error: #{error.message}"
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      212.

                def self.authorization_url

                  params = {

                # Exchange authorization code for tokens
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def self.exchange_code(code)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = HTTParty.post("#{OAUTH_URL}/token", {
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    headers: {
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                      "Authorization" => "Basic #{Base64.strict_encode64("#{oauth2_config[:client_id]}:#{oauth2_config[:client_secret]}")}",
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                      "Content-Type" => "application/json"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                      code: code,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                      redirect_uri: oauth2_config[:redirect_uri]
          
      45.

                    }.to_json
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  })
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0

                # List pages from Notion

                def list_pages(options = {})

                  start_cursor = options[:start_cursor]

                  begin

                    files = response.results.map do |page|

                      {
          
      66.

      68.

      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                        size: nil, # Notion doesn't provide size
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                        metadata: {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                          url: page.url,
          
      72.

      73.
