                          last_edited_time: page.last_edited_time,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                          parent_type: page.parent.type,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                          parent_id: page.parent[page.parent.type.to_sym]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                      files: files,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                      next_cursor: response.next_cursor,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                      has_more: response.has_more
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue Notion::Api::Errors::NotionError => e
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    handle_notion_api_error(e)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                alias_method :list_files, :list_pages
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Import a page from Notion
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def import_page(page_id)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get page details
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                    page = @client.page(page_id: page_id)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get page content blocks
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    blocks = []
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    start_cursor = nil
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    loop do
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                      response = @client.block_children(
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                        block_id: page_id,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                        start_cursor: start_cursor,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                        page_size: 100
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                      blocks.concat(response.results)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      start_cursor = response.next_cursor
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      break unless response.has_more
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Convert blocks to HTML
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    content = blocks_to_html(blocks)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    title = extract_page_title(page)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: title,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                      content: content,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                      mime_type: "text/html",
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                      size: content.bytesize
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue Notion::Api::Errors::NotionError => e
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    handle_notion_api_error(e)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                alias_method :import_file, :import_page
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                # Export a document to Notion
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def export_document(document, options = {})
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  parent_page_id = options[:parent_page_id]
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Create page properties
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    properties = {
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      "title" => {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                        "title" => [
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                          {
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                            "type" => "text",
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                            "text" => { "content" => document.title }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                        ]
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Create page
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    page = @client.create_page(
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      parent: parent_page_id ? { page_id: parent_page_id } : { type: "workspace" },
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                      properties: properties
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Add content blocks
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    blocks = html_to_blocks(document.content.to_s)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if blocks.any?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      @client.update_block_children(
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                        block_id: page.id,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                        children: blocks
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Create or update cloud file record
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    cloud_file = integration.cloud_files.find_or_create_by(
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                      file_id: page.id
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    cloud_file.update!(
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                      provider: "notion",
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: document.title,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      mime_type: "application/x-notion-page",
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                      size: nil,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                      document: document,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                      metadata: {
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                        url: page.url,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                        created_time: page.created_time,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                        last_edited_time: page.last_edited_time
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                      },
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      last_synced_at: Time.current
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    cloud_file
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue Notion::Api::Errors::NotionError => e
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                    handle_notion_api_error(e)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                private
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def extract_page_title(page)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try to extract title from properties
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if page.properties && page.properties["title"]
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                    title_property = page.properties["title"]
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if title_property["title"] && title_property["title"].any?
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                      return title_property["title"].map { |t| t["plain_text"] }.join
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try other common property names
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  %w[Title Name Page].each do |prop_name|
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if page.properties && page.properties[prop_name]
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      prop = page.properties[prop_name]
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      if prop["title"] && prop["title"].any?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                        return prop["title"].map { |t| t["plain_text"] }.join
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Untitled"
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def blocks_to_html(blocks)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  html_parts = blocks.map do |block|
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                    case block.type
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "paragraph"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.paragraph.rich_text)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<p>#{text}</p>"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "heading_1"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.heading_1.rich_text)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<h1>#{text}</h1>"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "heading_2"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.heading_2.rich_text)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<h2>#{text}</h2>"
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "heading_3"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.heading_3.rich_text)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<h3>#{text}</h3>"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "bulleted_list_item"
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.bulleted_list_item.rich_text)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<li>#{text}</li>"
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "numbered_list_item"
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.numbered_list_item.rich_text)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<li>#{text}</li>"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "quote"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.quote.rich_text)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<blockquote>#{text}</blockquote>"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "code"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = extract_rich_text(block.code.rich_text)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                      language = block.code.language
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                      "<pre><code class=\"language-#{language}\">#{CGI.escapeHTML(text)}</code></pre>"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Skip unsupported block types
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                      ""
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                  html_parts.join("\n")
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                def extract_rich_text(rich_text_array)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return "" unless rich_text_array
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                  rich_text_array.map do |rt|
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                    text = CGI.escapeHTML(rt["plain_text"])
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply formatting
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if rt["annotations"]
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      text = "<strong>#{text}</strong>" if rt["annotations"]["bold"]
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      text = "<em>#{text}</em>" if rt["annotations"]["italic"]
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261.

                def handle_notion_api_error(error)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                  case error.code
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when "unauthorized"
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise AuthenticationError, "Notion authentication failed: #{error.message}"
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when "restricted_resource"
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise AuthorizationError, "Notion access restricted: #{error.message}"
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when "object_not_found"
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise NotFoundError, "Notion resource not found: #{error.message}"
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ApiError, "Notion API error: #{error.message}"
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      346.

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              # Context management
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def update_context(new_context)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                sub_agent.update_context(new_context)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def merge_context(additional_context)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                sub_agent.merge_context(additional_context)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102.

              # Export and summary

              def export_conversation

              def summary
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                sub_agent.summary
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def generate_assistant_response(user)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                # Mock assistant response for testing
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                # In production, this would call the AI API
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                response_content = "I understand your message. How can I help you further?"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                sub_agent.messages.create!(
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: "assistant",
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  content: response_content,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: user
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to generate assistant response: #{e.message}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              # Helper method for conversation history
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

              def conversation_history
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                sub_agent.messages.recent.limit(20).map do |msg|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                  { role: msg.role, content: msg.content }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      151.
